description: Zack is a very handy man. He is frequently doing some renovation work at my house. During his last visit, he found a hand job stroker while looking for some tools in the basement. Being a very sexual person, it was obvious that he had to try it. I didn't mind the overtime he did that day. The simple idea of having this gorgeous guy stripping and stroking a floor below was very exciting. Another great classic adventure from Zack. Enjoy!
title: Powertool, Scene #01
